column3: School of Natural, Social and Sport Sciences
column5: WHAT IS GEOGRAPHY?Read moreWe offer a range of postgraduate research opportunities for Geography at the University of Gloucestershire, these include Masters by Research, PhD (via thesis submission) and PhD by Publication. This will enable you to undertake cutting-edge scientific research in a supportive and caring environment. We have a range of laboratory facilities, field equipment and staff have extensive experience undertaking fieldwork both in the UK and further afield.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
